name: ALIEN XENOCIDE Kickstarter Demo
description:
ALIEN XENOCIDE is a wild n' reckless, retro platformer featuring explosive gameplay, arcade callbacks with modern twists, and a sense of humor. Fast paced platforming, aliens, and a babelicious babe — what's not to like?

Space aliens and mediocre delivery girls Blunt and Kif work for XENO XPRESS, an intergalactic delivery service owned by their boss, Eugene Hash. After goofing off on the job for so long, the lovebirds are presented one last chance to keep their jobs: a delivery of a cardboard cutout to “Mayor Roogan” on planet Goobtopia. What they don’t know however, is the entire planet is swarming with infectious GOOBERS, a highly infectious race of dorky aliens. They'll stop at nothing to protect not only their jobs — but the package.

This demo includes over 4 STAGES, a BOSSFIGHT, CUTSCENES, as well as an 8 TRACK SOUNDTRACK, SMOOTH ANIMATIONS, and way too many Goobers.

If you liked what you saw, consider checking out our KICKSTARTER HERE
